participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Does anyone know if the Job Status API responses of OK or ERROR are case sensitive? Also, are these the only two status options?

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Does Status response capture scenarios such as server down, etc.?

It looks like this is the set of statuses we have: `Accepted values: COMPLETE, FAILED, RUNNING, PAUSED, CANCELLED`
@abhilash has more context
In Job status API, `status` is always OK or ERROR. Upper case. For flow jobs, we also have a `state` which can be one of values mentioned by Eric.
